languages.text: {n}Ваш удар не достигает цели — скоморох неожиданно споро отскакивает прочь, дурашливо приплясывая и улюлюкая.{/n}
{n}You miss your mark as the fool jumps away with surprising agility, dancing and jeering as he goes.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ваш удар не достигает цели — скоморох неожиданно споро отскакивает прочь, дурашливо приплясывая и улюлюкая.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你的攻击失手了，小丑以令人惊异的灵活动作避开了攻击，一边跳舞，一边嬉笑。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You miss your mark as the fool jumps away with surprising agility, dancing and jeering as he goes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你的攻击失手了，小丑以令人惊异的灵活动作避开了攻击，一边跳舞，一边嬉笑。{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたの攻撃を道化は驚くほど俊敏に跳ねてかわし、踊りながら嘲るように笑って立ち去っていった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You miss your mark as the fool jumps away with surprising agility, dancing and jeering as he goes.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yerras el golpe cuando el bufón se aparta de un brinco con sorprendente agilidad, danzando y mofándose de ti.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Hedefin, şaşırtıcı bir çeviklikle yana sıçradığı için ıskalıyorsun. Soytarı, dans edip alay ederek uzaklaşıyor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le bouffon s'écarte d'un bond étonnamment agile qui vous fait manquer votre cible, puis se trémousse et ricane en s'éloignant.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You miss your mark as the fool jumps away with surprising agility, dancing and jeering as he goes.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du verfehlst den Narren, der mit einer erstaunlichen Behändigkeit ausweicht und lachend und tanzend von dannen zieht.{/n}
